job.title: Junior Software Engineer
job.description: pIf youve ever wasted a day trying to land a twoline change because you were thwarted by merge conflicts linting errors flaky tests and the myriad other things that can go wrong and thought there has to be a better way then weve got the role for you Were a team of engineers building systems that will remove the friction of everyday software development and are looking for talented engineers to help us get thereppbrppTrunk is annbspAndreessen Horowitznbspfunded dev tools startup with a killer exUberGoogle founding team Were building a product that will redefine software development at scaleppbrppWere still in the early stages of development so theres plenty of greenfield to own and projects to take on Well have tons of leadership opportunities as we grow but right now every person at Trunk is coding all day every day and we have a flat structureppbrppWeve spent enough time inside some of the best and worst development environments to realize there is a better way to build code at scale  and wed love for you to join us to make it a realityppbrppstrongWere looking for engineers whostrongpulliAre productminded with a strong intuition about making great development environmentsliliCreate highquality mockups and prototypes that can grow into products our users loveliliHave a keen sense for intuitive user experiences and good design We want to build products that just work and feel rightliliLove building userfacing interfaces but are comfortable navigating the full stack and modifying features in backend servicesliliAre able to think holistically about system integration and where all of the pieces fit togetherliliBelieve strongly in the importance of unit and integration tests throughout the entire tech stackliliKnow when to dive deep into a project and when to pull the plug to work around blockersliliSee a problem and want to solve it after maybe complaining about itliliAre opinionated about how highquality software should be written but never drown out the thoughts of othersliliSolve problems on their own but know when to ask for a helping handliulpbrppstrongOur Tech Stacknbspexpertise appreciated but not requiredstrongpulliTypescriptliliReact  PuppeteerliliNodejsliligRPC  gRPCwebliliAWSliliCliliBazelliulpbrppstrongWhats it like to work at TrunkstrongppYou know that team in your current company that somehow manages to get an outsized amount of work done while still enjoying their roles thats us on some days Other days we are banging our collective heads against the wall trying to wrangle gRPC  typescript  Bazel to play nicely together We seriously enjoy the challenge of writing code and building new systemsppbrppstrongNext stepsstrongppThe next step in our process is a projectbased assessment on the Hatchways platformp
